total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern in the transformation of the input grid to the output grid in the examples.
Q2: Notice that the input grid is repeated three times horizontally in the output grid.
Q3: Observe that the first three rows of the output grid are filled with the repeated input grid, and the remaining rows are filled with zeros.
Q4: Apply the same transformation to the input grid of the quiz.
